details.name: Tulip
details.abstractText:
A Joomla based website
Tulip design is a site for graphics and web design
They wanted a multi-step PHP web form for their site
details.sec1Text1: Online order forms are there in most sites, Only successfull sites are those that implement a good UX and UI forms for their customers.
details.sec1Text2: What always attracks the visitors is the landing page, and What will make you continue filling the form is its first page which make you trust that is is a profisional site and you can trust to get your work done with them.
details.sec2Header: A good design for each step
details.sec2Text: Each step is designed to give a great UX to the customers with features required for every online form like multi-select and file upload
details.sec2Quote: Akram took the task and completed it successfully.

details.name: Matrimonial
details.abstractText:
Matrimonial is a lawyer firm for divorce and family law
They wanted an online portfolio that represents their business, their experience and facilitate contacting them
details.sec1Text1: A good landing page is the key feature for the success of this project, it should represent the experience and the services of the firm
details.sec1Text2: With the help of great images and the black and white color scheme, the end result was perfect and appealing to the eye
details.sec2Text: There is a good saying that you should not judge a book buy its cover, while that is true, most peoples get attracted to strong and appealing covers / landing pages

details.name: Tradition
details.abstractText:
A japanise tea meeting
Annual tradition that needs some advertising with animations and page that have a japanise style to it
details.sec1Text1: Traditions always have benifits, showing these benifits in an exciting and appealing manar is vital to project success
details.sec1Text2: With the help of web animations and good styling, page elements ended up floating in a good yet creative manner with text appearing the way a native japanise writer will do
details.sec2Header: Cup of Tea for Each One
details.sec2Text: gatherings are always happy places filled with good memories, by emphasizing that we encourage more people to come and join every time that event take place

details.name: Clean
details.abstractText:
A small personal cleanning business for university students
They wanted a site that represents their services and facilitate online payment
details.sec1Text1: With the new Braintree payment system that both accept PayPal payment and traditional crediti cards, the site became a good presentaion of the business
details.sec1Text2: Showing different services with a good presentation and animation the site ended with a great landing page that the client is happy with
details.sec2Text: Even if you are student, that can not stop you from creating a successful business, you just have to pick an area you are good at and start working
details.sec2Quote: He's great to work with and very patient. Work with him if you get a chance. You wouldn't regret it.

details.name: Murray
details.abstractText:
This project was done with my team because of its vast functionalities
What is really special about it though is its landing page and animations
details.sec1Text1: The project was oriented to be a perfect landing page with powerfull animations that makes the contents of the page stand out
details.sec1Text2: Different animations in different sections that showed the rankings, ease in and ease out animations, great color scheme, all these factors helped in the project success
details.sec2Text: Although the project isn't really doing much. It acted as a good presentaion of the Murray group and the skills and experience of our team in these kind of projects

details.name: Global
details.abstractText:
This project was done with my team winning a www award
What is really special about it though is its landing page and animations
details.sec1Text1: The project was oriented to be a perfect landing page with powerfull animations that makes the contents of the page stand out
details.sec1Text2: With great design and animations the project was a success and showed the different aspect of the M2MBlue
details.sec2Text: A successful company is made with successful team, that is why M2MBlue trusted our teams and our experience to deliver their page to their expectation
